dialog: What are your quill skills like, my dear?
I can transcribe at a pace of 80 words per minute without error, and my hand is quick enough to take dictation in the English language at a speed of 120 words per minute.
Are these the robes you desire to have cleaned, madam?
Aye, when might I retrieve them?
If they are collected posthaste, you may have them returned to you this very evening.
That is acceptable. Please ensure my suit is treated with a scouring charm, if you would be so kind.
Very well, kindly fill out the registry first.
What ails me, good Healer? I find myself feeling quite fatigued of late.
Your blood pressure is the cause, I'm afraid. 'Tis far too elevated.
What could be the root of this issue?
O'erwork, amongst other causes. One cannot toil for 24 hours a day. You must take it easier, lest you drive yourself to exhaustion.
But I cannot simply cease my labors.
You must, I fear. And have you not noticed? You weigh 200 stone. 'Tis far too much for one of your stature.
Are you suggesting I must shed some weight?
Aye. You must reduce your intake of bread and potatoes, and take more exercise.
You rise early, Tom. What do you do with your mornings?
I engage in physical activity. The morning hours are the most precious of the day and should not be wasted. I seize the time and put it to good use.
So, you spend your mornings building your strength. Where do you typically train?
Typically, I run to the Black Bamboo Park as a warm-up. The admission is free of charge. Then, I commence my regimen.
Do you follow the same regimen every day?
